title: Manage Transmittal of Documents
description: A set of new design drawings needs to be formally transmitted to the client for their review and approval.

tasks.description: Create a new document transmittal in the system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully initiates a new transmittal record.

tasks.description: Select the 10 drawings that need to be sent and add them to the transmittal.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly attaches the 10 specific drawings to the transmittal.

tasks.description: Issue the transmittal, which sends a formal notification to the client and logs the date and purpose of the submission.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent issues the transmittal, and the system records the action and notifies the client.
